subject: p13896515
History: Year old man with new CS lead, evaluate for lead placement and pneumothorax evaluate for lead placement and pneumothorax.
Impression: In comparison with the study of, there has been placement of a pacer lead extending into the coronary sinus system. There is continued enlargement of the cardiac silhouette with increasing pulmonary vascular congestion. Retrocardiac opacification is consistent with volume loss in the left lower lobe and probable small pleural effusion.
